Case_1.Scene Description: Indoors, likely a restaurant. The table is set with food and drinks, including a steak, fries, salad, and a glass of wine. The background features other tables, chairs, and some decor.

people.Looks: The person has short black hair and is wearing a black jacket with a fur collar over a black shirt and a patterned tie.
people.Actions: sitting at the table, holding a glass of wine
people.Line: Yeah, it's so tiring to keep spending money. I have a whole truckload of these, I just change them when they get dirty. If you like this one, I'll give it to you. So, what brings you to see me? Did Zhao Yan know you were coming? Ah, when was that? Hey, you should sit back down. Ah, sit back down. Sit back down. I guess so. Not much, just 5 billion. But, I've already spent 300 million, what's the big deal, there are still hundreds of billions waiting for me to inherit. However, to get this money directly, there are conditions.

Case_3.Scene Description: Indoors, likely a restaurant or dining area. The setting includes tables, chairs, a glass of wine, a plate of food, and background decorations such as plants and ambient lighting.

people.Looks: The person has long dark hair, is wearing a light blue off-shoulder top, and has dangling earrings.
people.Actions: The person is sitting at a table, possibly engaged in a conversation.
people.Line: Keming, you've been busy lately, haven't you? I'm really happy that you still want to see me. It was all my fault before, treating you that way. Actually, it was all for your own good. My previous spending was just too much, I didn't want to burden you too much, so I proposed to break up. Are you hot? Let me help you take off your fur coat. I remember you weren't wearing this one before. I miss you, is that not allowed? We broke up. After the last car show, I felt he treated you too badly, so I had a big fight with him and broke up. Where did you get the money from? Weren't you raised in an orphanage? Found my family. How much did they give you? What are the conditions?
